name: Binx
description:
Binx

3D Side Scroller with Third Person Capabilties.


Game Description

'Binx' is set in a medieval kingdom that has been overuled by an evil enchantress. After returning home to find you trusty cat companion has been kidnapped, you must embark on a quest to find Binx.

On your journey you will encounter scary magical enemies and have to solve puzzles in the hope that you will find your trusty friend. 


Game Play Through

Here is the playthrough of our game!

This game was created as part of a university module for our third year.
